domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text: I think DOH is just “riding out” COVID-19 until a vaccine is invented. I dont see nor feel any active/serious efforts being done by it. The DOH, as the lead agency of the IATF should do precisely that - lead in a proactive way & not simply be content in reporting out statistics.
